rows.name: Witchery
rows.description: A small sign of Chaos manifests: milk nearby you sours, animals spook, a cold breeze blows, etc.

rows.name: Hexeyes
rows.description: Your eyes take on a film of your Lore's color for 1d10 hours. While your eyes are discolored you have 1 Blinded condition.

rows.name: Blight
rows.description: Willpower Bonus fields or fertile areas with Willpower Bonus miles suffer a blight and rot.

rows.name: Soulwax
rows.description: Your ears clog with unnatural wax, which can only be removed with the use of the Heal skill. Until then, you have 1 Deafened condition.

rows.name: Witchlight
rows.description: You glow with the eerie light of your Lore, emitting light as a large bonfire for 1d10 rounds.

rows.name: Fell Whispers
rows.description: The voice of a daemonic entity is carried to you. Pass a Challenging(+0) Willpower Test to avoid listening or gain 1 Corruption Point.

rows.name: Facebleed
rows.description: Your nose, eyes, and ears bleed profusely. Gain 1 Bleeding Condition.

rows.name: Soulquake
rows.description: Gain the Prone Condition.

rows.name: Aethyric Needle
rows.description: You lose 1 Wound: 1d5 nails blacken and fall, a small wound appears in the shape of a heretical symbol, you bite into your lips or tongue from mystical shock, etc.

rows.name: Wayward Garb
rows.description: Your clothes writhe with a mind of their own. You receive 1 Entangled condition with a Strength of 1d10x5 to resist.

rows.name: Creeping Congregation
rows.description: Insects fill the area around you, buzzing and crawling. If in combat, roll a Challenging(+0) Cool test or take 1 Surprised condition.

rows.name: Souldrain
rows.description: Gain 1 Fatigued Condition for 1d10 hours as the Winds leech part of your power.

rows.name: Regurgitation
rows.description: You vomit an unnatural volume of bile, blood, putrid slime, insects. etc. You take 1 Stunned condition.

rows.name: Unholy Visions
rows.description: The Winds swarm your sight with visions of unholy acts. Receive 1 Blinded Condition, pass a Challenging(+0) Cool Test or gain another.

rows.name: Cloying Tongue
rows.description: Your tongue becomes thick and swollen. All Language Tests (including Casting tests) suffer a -10 penalty for 1d10 rounds.

rows.name: The Horror!
rows.description: Pass a Hard(-20) Cool Test or gain 1 Broken Condition.

rows.name: Curse of Corruption
rows.description: Gain 1 Corruption point as wild magic brings you to the edge of terrible truths.

rows.name: Double Trouble
rows.description: The Winds whisk away your spell, causing it to take effect elsewhere within 1d10 miles. The GM is encouraged to make this cause consequences.

rows.name: Multiplying Misfortune
rows.description: Roll twice on this table.

rows.name: Unlucky!
rows.description: Roll on the Major table instead.
